page.title: 04Ecology, flowers/butterflies
page.content: In the small areas of unimproved chalkland many indigenous flowers are found including; eyebright, squinanc- ywort, fariyflax, clustered bellflower milkwort & autumn gentian. Early purple, common spotted, pyramid, bee, fly, white & broad leaved helleborine orchids can sometimes be seen. In the woods dog's mercury, violets, primrose bluebells, wood anemone, wood sorrel, woodruff,sancile ramson & figwort grow The hedgerows produce stitchwort, red & white campion, nettles, lady's smock cow parsley & celandine. Peacock, brimstone, small tortoiseshell, small & large white & red admiral can usually be found. common, chalkhill & holly blue, white admiral, purple emperor, silver-washed and Duke of Burgundy fritillary appear in certain places.
